amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds from being used to finalize any rule or regulation that has resulted in or is likely to result in an annual effect on the economy of $100 million or more.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cammack amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cammack amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
